## ISL Exercise 4.8.13 (a)-(i) (50pts)

![](images/clipboard-2962329981.png){width="667"}

![](images/clipboard-3390512393.png){width="661"}

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Solution:

```{r}
# Set the working directory to the folder containing the CSV file
setwd("~/biostat-212A-2025-winter/ALL CSV FILES - 2nd Edition")

# Load the Weekly data from the CSV file
Weekly <- read.csv("Weekly.csv")
```

\(a\)

```{r}
# Convert factor or character columns to numeric
numeric_columns <- c("Lag1", "Lag2", "Lag3", "Lag4", "Lag5")
for (col in numeric_columns) {
    Weekly[[col]] <- as.numeric(as.character(Weekly[[col]]))
}

# Check the first few rows to ensure it's loaded correctly
head(Weekly)

# Creating pairs plot for only numeric columns
pairs(Weekly[sapply(Weekly, is.numeric)])
hist(Weekly$Volume, main = "Histogram of Volume", xlab = "Volume")

```
